Package org.cyclops.integrateddynamics.api.evaluate.variable

Interface IValueTypeLightLevelRegistry

All Superinterfaces:
org.cyclops.cyclopscore.init.IRegistry
All Known Implementing Classes:
ValueTypeLightLevelRegistry
public interface IValueTypeLightLevelRegistry extends org.cyclops.cyclopscore.init.IRegistry
Registry for mapping value types to their light level calculator.
